questions:
What are the merchant tools?
Tell me about the merchant tools
What merchant tools are available?
What tools are there for merchants.
content:
Merchant tools are a suite of tools to help webmasters monetize their sites. They include "buy with cryptocurrency" buttons, subscriptions, payment requests and a api for developers.

Integrations with woocommerce is also available.

Setup is designed to be as simple as possible with full details on the merchant page at https;//platform.jsecoin.com
